law.catch_line: Notification of disciplinary action taken against business or professional licensee.
law.text: Any person licensed or certified by the board shall immediately notify the office of the board in writing if any professional or business license that is issued to the person by any agency of the Commonwealth or any other jurisdiction is surrendered or terminated under threat of disciplinary action or is refused, suspended, or revoked, or if renewal of continuance is denied.
law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 16, effective July 15, 2002.
